name: Trunk Categories
description: Categories based on the position and style of the elephant's trunk, reflecting cultural and artistic symbolism.

types.name: Trunk Up
types.description: Trunk raised upwards, symbolizing good luck and prosperity.

types.name: Trunk Down
types.description: Trunk hanging downwards, symbolizing strength and stability.

types.name: Trunk Curled
types.description: Trunk curled in various ways, adding a dynamic artistic element.
